channel.title: Whatcom County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Whatcom County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North - Customs and Immigration
item.description: I-5 north - Customs and Immigration 1/2 mile. Use right lanes for Nexus.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 276
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 276 - WA-548 South/Blaine City Center. This is the last exit on I-5 northbound.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 276 Services
item.description: Services located at I-5 Exit 276. This is the last exit before the Canadian border.

item.title: I-5 North - Customs and Immigrations 1 Mile
item.description: I-5 north - Customs and Immigrations 1 Mile.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 276
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 276 - WA-548 South/Blaine City Center. Exit 276 is the last exit on I-5 before the Canadian border.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 275
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 275 - WA-543 North/Border Crossing. WA-543 crosses the Canadian border at the Pacific Highway border crossing, which is the border crossing for commercial vehicles. Non-commercial vehicles may cross at Pacific Highway as well.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Map
item.description: Border Crossing map on I-5 north approaching WA-543.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Hours
item.description: I-5/WA-543 Border Crossing Hours on I-5 north. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossings are open 24 Hours.

item.title: I-5 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-5 north. Distance to Point Roberts and Vancouver, BC. This is the last distance marker on I-5 northbound. Point Roberts is an exclave of the United States. All traffic into Point Roberts has to go through Canada.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 275
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 275 - WA-543 North/Border Crossing. Use WA-543 for the Pacific Highway border crossing into Canada.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 274
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 274 - Peace Portal Drive/Semiahmoo.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 274
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 274 - Peace Portal Drive/Semiahmoo.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Wait Times
item.description: Border Wait Times on I-5 North. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossing are less than 5 minutes in this photo. This was taken at 7 AM on a Saturday. As it happened there was only one car in front of me at Canada Customs.

item.title: Birch Bay-Lynden Road East at I-5
item.description: Birch Bay-Lynden Road East at I-5. Use I-5 south for Seattle; use I-5 north for Vancouver, BC.

item.title: Birch Bay-Lynden Road at WA-548
item.description: Birch Bay-Lynden Road at WA-548 (Blaine Road) Junction.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 270
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 270 - Lynden/Birch Bay.

item.title: I-5 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-5 south. Distance to Ferndale, Bellingham, and Seattle. This is the first exit on I-5 south of the border crossing.

item.title: I-5 South - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on I-5 south. This sign is right after the onramps from the Exit 276 interchange.

item.title: I-5 South - Blaine
item.description: I-5 south shield in Blaine, Washington.

item.title: WA-548 South at I-5 North
item.description: WA-548 South at I-5 North to (Peace Arch) Border Crossing. Note the Highway Entrance, instead of Freeway Entrance.

item.title: Begin WA-548 South at I-5
item.description: Begin WA-548 South at I-5. Turn right for I-5 north to (Peace Arch) Border Crossing. Continue through roundabout for D St., and WA-548 South/(Blaine)City Center.

item.title: WA-548 North Approaching I-5 North Onramp
item.description: WA-548 North approaching I-5 North Onramp. Use I-5 north for (Peace Arch) Border Crossing. Continue through roundabout for 2nd St. (to Peace Arch State Park) and D St.

item.title: WA-548 North at I-5 South
item.description: WA-548 North at I-5 South (Exit 276) onramp.

item.title: I-5 South - Welcome To The United States of America
item.description: I-5 South - Welcome To The United States of America at the US-Canada international boundary. Sign is before the Peace Arch Customs station.

item.title: WA-548 - Grandview Road Roundabout
item.description: Roundabout on WA-548 (Grandview Road). Go north on roundabout to continue north on WA-548; west to continue on Grandview Road; north for the (Cherry Point) BP Refinery.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 266
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 266 - WA-548 North/Custer/Grandview Road.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 263
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 263 - Portal Way.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 262
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 262 - Main St./City Center (Ferndale).

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 260
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 260 - Lummi Island/Slater Road.

item.title: I-5 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-5 north. Distance to Ferndale and Blaine. Blaine is where I-5 ends at the Canadian border.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 257 and 258
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 257 - Northwest Avenue. Approaching Exit 258 - Bakerview Road/Bellingham International Airport.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 256A, 256B, and 257
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 256A - WA-539 North/Meridian St./Lynden. Also at Exit 256B - Bellis Fair Mall. Approaching Exit 257 - Northwest Ave.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 256A and 256B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 256A - WA-539 North/Meridian St./Lynden. Approaching Exit 256B - Bellis Fair Mall.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 256A-B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exits 256A-B - WA-539 North/Meridian St./Bellis Fair Mall. WA-539 leads to two of the border crossings into Canada in Whatcom County.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 254 and 255
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 254 - State St./Iowa St. Approaching Exit 255 - WA-542 East/Sunset Drive/Mount Baker.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 253 and 254
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 253 - Lakeway Drive. Approaching Exit 254 - State St./Iowa St.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 252 and 253
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 252 - Samish Way/Wester Washington University. Approaching Exit 253 - Lakeway Drive.

item.title: WA-11 South at I-5 South
item.description: WA-11 South at I-5 South to Seattle.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 250 Offramp at WA-11
item.description: I-5 North - Exit 250 Offramp at WA-11. Use WA-11 South to Chuckanut Drive and the truck route.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 250 and 252
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 250 - WA-11 South/Chuckanut Drive/Old Fairhaven Parkway. Approaching Exit 252 - Samish Way/Western Washington University.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 250
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 250 - WA-11 South/Chuckanut Drive/Old Fairhaven Parkway.

item.title: I-5 North - Fairhaven Terminals
item.description: Fairhaven Terminals Information sign on I-5 North. Use Exit 250 for the Alaska Ferry, Amtrak, and the bus station.

item.title: Port Of Lynden Hours
item.description: Port of Lynden hours and alternate Ports of Entry at the Canada/US Boundary.

item.title: WA-539 North At Canada Customs
item.description: WA-539 north approaching Canada Customs - Be Prepared To Stop.

item.title: WA-539 South - Leaving US Customs
item.description: WA-539 south leaving the US Customs facility.
